data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Půža, Vladimír (2017): Alloionema californicum Nermuť, Půža, Mráček & Lewis, 2016 is a junior synonym of Alloionema similis Holovachov, Boström, Tandingan De Ley, Mc Donnell, Alvarado, Paine & De Ley, 2016 (Nematoda: Alloionematidae). Zootaxa 4324 (2): 378-384, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4324.2.10
